metadata.title: CVE-2021-31259 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The gf_isom_cenc_get_default_info_internal function in GPAC 1.0.1 allowsattackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference) via acrafted file in the MP4Box command.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
